flexibleDate.description: Hugo date field supporting multiple formats

kind.description:
The kind of page, e.g. "page", "section", "home" etc. This is usually derived from the content path. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#kind

path.description:
The canonical path to the page, e.g. /sect/mypage. Note: Leading slash, no trailing slash, no extensions or language identifiers. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#path

lang.description:
The language code for this page. This is usually derived from the module mount or filename. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter

linkTitle.description:
The link title of the page. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#linktitle

type.description:
The content type of the page. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#type

layout.description:
The layout to use for to render this page. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#layout

weight.description:
The weight of the page, used in sorting if set to a non-zero value. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#weight

uRL.description:
The URL to the rendered page, e.g. /sect/mypage.html. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#url

draft.description:
Whether or not the content is a draft. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#draft

isCJKLanguage.description:
Whether or not the content is in a CJK language. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#iscjklanguage

translationKey.description:
The translation key for this page. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#translationkey

outputs.description:
The output formats to render this page in. If not set, the site's configured output formats for this page kind will be used. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#outputs

list.description:
Whether to add it to any of the page collections.
Note that the page can always be found with .Site.GetPage.
Valid values: never, always, local.
Setting it to 'local' means they will be available via the local
page collections, e.g. $section.Pages.
Note: before 0.57.2 this was a bool, so we accept those too. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#build

render.description:
Whether to render it.
Valid values: never, always, link.
The value link means it will not be rendered, but it will get a RelPermalink/Permalink.
Note that before 0.76.0 this was a bool, so we accept those too. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#build

publishResources.description:
Whether to publish its resources. These will still be published on demand,
but enabling this can be useful if the originals (e.g. images) are
never used. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#build

menus.description:
Can be a string, []string or map[string]any. 
https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter#menus
